com.wookler.server.common

Class AbstractCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wookler.server.common.AbstractCounter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<AbstractCounter>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Counter

    public abstract class AbstractCounter
extends Object
implements Comparable<AbstractCounter>
    Abstract base class for defining counters.
    Author:
    Subho Ghosh (subho dot ghosh at outlook.com)

      • mode

        Returns:
        - Counter Mode.

      • mode

        public AbstractCounter mode(AbstractCounter.Mode mode)
        Set the counter mode. (PROD/DEBUG) The mode defines whether the counter is captured only when DEBUG mode is enabled for logging.
        Parameters:
        mode - - Counter mode.
        Returns:
        - self.

      • namespace

        public String namespace()
        Get the namespace of this counter. Namespaces are used to group counters into logical units.
        Returns:
        - Counter namespace.

      • total

        public AbstractMeasure total()
        Get the Total counter value. Total value represents the cumulative since the counter started.
        Returns:
        - Measure total.

      • period

        public AbstractMeasure period()
        Get the current period counter value. Period value represents the cumulative for the current period. Periods are defined using the configured recycle time window.
        Returns:
        - Period measure.

      • delta

        public AbstractMeasure delta(boolean clear)
        Get the unread delta counter value. Deltas are incremental values computed since the last read with the clear flag.
        Parameters:
        clear - - Clear the delta value?
        Returns:
        - Delta measure
